title: U.S. strikes in Syria hit every target: Pentagon
text:
U.S. strikes in Syria hit every target: Pentagon Saturday, April 14, 2018 - 01:25 
The Pentagon said on Saturday that U.S. strikes in Syria overnight had successfully hit every target and were aimed to deliver an unambiguous signal to the Syrian government and deter the future use of chemical weapons. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
